name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **GoLang**, **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with hands-on expertise in building scalable applications using **Kubernetes**, **PostgreSQL**, and cloud services including **Cloud Object Storage** and **GCP Pub/Sub**. Skilled in leveraging **gRPC**, **REST**, and creating effective CI/CD pipelines with tools like **GitLab CI** and **ArgoCD**. Experienced in monitoring and observability through **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **Loki**, and **Tempo**.
Brings a strong background in full-stack development using technologies such as JavaScript/TypeScript, Python with frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Dedicated to building secure, maintainable solutions adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Demonstrates practical experience in MLOps, developing ML pipelines, and deploying models with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about creating systems that drive significant real-world impact.
